import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { getAllUsers } from './actions/user_actions'; function UsersList() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const userId = useSelector(state => state.user_reducer.user); useEffect(() => { async function func() { let response = await dispatch(getAllUsers()); setUsers(response.payload.data.users); } func(); }, [dispatch]) return (
{ users.map((user) => ( user._id === userId ? <>

{user.name}

{user.name}

{user.name}

{user.name}

{user.name}

{user.name}

{user.name}

{user.name}

{user.name}

{user.name}

: " " )) }
) } export default UsersList
